frontMatter.title: Data Migration Plan
frontMatter.metaDescription: A systematic plan to smoothly migrate data (system data, users, user data, etc.) from the old platform to a new platform with feature compatibility. Have a migration strategy.

checklist.question: Have you identified the data source and storage?
checklist.expectation: Provide an overview of the current state of data, its storage, and potential restrictions.

checklist.question: Who is going to involve in migration?
checklist.expectation: Identify key stakeholders, relevant subject matter experts and everyone that has a voice in this project.

checklist.question: What are you going to migrate?
checklist.expectation: Which data will your migration require? And any relevant reports for the legacy data, including the frequency of use and whether or not you analyze trends in historical data.
